channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A deadly crash, a divided nation: Why Sikh truckers are now in the crossfire
item.description: Members of California’s Sikh trucking community say a deadly crash involving one of its own has led to a spike in anti-Sikh rhetoric.

item.title: Homeland security official says 475 people were detained during an immigration raid in Georgia
Scientists tap ‘secret’ fresh water under the ocean, raising hopes for a thirsty world
